beans.Histoire

Packages that use Histoire
Package Description
dao  

  • Uses of Histoire in dao

    Methods in dao that return Histoire
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Histoire HistoireDAO.getHistoire​(java.lang.String title)
    this method allows to get all the information stored in the data base about a story identified by the given parameters
    Methods in dao that return types with arguments of type Histoire
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.LinkedList<Histoire> HistoireDAO.listOfStoriesToEdit​(Utilisateur user)
    allows to retrieve the list of the stories that the user given in parameter has the right to edit it concerns the public stories for editing, the stories created by the given user and the ones to which he's invited.
    java.util.LinkedList<Histoire> HistoireDAO.listOfStoriesToRead​(boolean isConnected)
    The list of stories that a user has the right to read depending of its status if he's logged in or not
    java.util.LinkedList<Histoire> HistoireDAO.storiesCreatedBy​(java.lang.String user)
